The course includes the following modules
Lectures:

1. Introduction to financial analytics
2. Introduction to financial markets and basic accounting
3. Rstudio cloud and simple operations 
4 .Working with financial data (any data): data sources, tidyverse, descriptives
5. Data wrangling and visualization: types, basic statistics, uses, application
6. Analytics and visualization: cases in financial analytics 
7. introduction to modelling and R
8. Predictive modeling in R: building and assessing simple models
9. Building regression models
